data.name: Zruce Adventures Demo
data.detailed_description:
WARNING

This game is only a demo and is NOT the final game. There´s a lot of things that will be changed. Now that that´s out of the way. Please enjoy this demo

Zruce Adventures is a 3D platformer with a spice of action game made set in the fantasy world of Mobius. Embark on a great adventure as you explore various places in North Island. The game is fully voice acted with side quests and optional content. Inspired by the gameplay of Super Mario Odyssey and Breath of the wild and the story of Winds of Change made by Klace Husky this game is like nothing you've seen... probably


Story

In the year 2030 far in a research facility in sector 12 a experiment goes out of control making the facility blow into pieces, although something escapes from it... 20 years later in a planet known as Mobius, a 18 year old folf who's name is Zruce is living a normal life in north forest in the island North Island. He's heading to Legend City when all of the sudden something strange happens, the forest he's in is being infested by robots, a meteorite strikes in the forest as Zruce hides from the robots, the meteorite contains a Sword that only the chosen one can wield... apparently that chosen one is Zruce in case you weren't listening. Zruce out of desperation grabs the sword.

Soon he realizes the world is in big danger. A protogen known as Glitch is trying to take over the world with his army of robots and is planning on making a new one habited by only robots without any living beings. Zruce must now stop his plans and save the world before it's too late.

Good luck out there.


Features

This game has multiple features so the player has multiple things to do while in the game, some of these are:
Outfits
Secret collectibles
Open world
Side Quests
Massive story line set in an incredible fantasy world!

data.short_description: Embark on a crazy adventure in a vast world. Explore different locations, solve puzzles, save the planet before an evil being destroys all life in the planet with his army of robots and fulfill Zruce's destiny
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
